word_mean: 装入阴模所需要的粉末量。

sentence.Network_en: You don't need green fingers to fill your home with lush leaves.
sentence.Network_cn: 不是园艺大师也可以把自己的家里装点得绿意盎然。

sentence.Network_en: Kemp got out of his car. "Just fill her up, thanks."
sentence.Network_cn: 肯普下了车。“给它加满油，谢谢。”

sentence.Network_en: Fill a saucepan with water and bring to a slow boil.
sentence.Network_cn: 往平底锅里加满水，小火煮沸。

with the admiration and love filled my eyes ., 我的情意总是轻易就洋溢眼底.

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)have as much of something as one wants; do something to the full

lj.lj_ly: fill your boots with spicy Szechuan food for under five bucks a plate.
lj.lj_ls: 每盘不足五美元的麻辣四川菜，请敞开肚子吃吧。

lj.lj_ly: fill your boots with spicy Szechuan food for under five bucks a plate.
lj.lj_ls: 每盘不足五美元的麻辣四川菜，请敞开肚子吃吧。

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)take over someone's function or duties and fulfil them satisfactorily
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)接替并胜任某人的职位（或职责）

jx.jx_en_mean: inform someone more fully of a matter, giving all the details

lj.lj_ly: I patiently &B{filled} him &B{in on} the British tradition of sherry tippling.
lj.lj_ls: 我耐心细致地给他讲述了英国人畅饮雪利酒的传统。

lj.lj_ly: I filled in a chap and took his money.
lj.lj_ls: 我揍了一个家伙，拿走了他的钱。

jx.jx_en_mean: put material into a hole, trench, or space so that it is completely full

lj.lj_ly: the canal is now disused and partly filled in.
lj.lj_ls: 这条运河现在废弃不用，已经部分堵塞了。

jx.jx_en_mean: (chiefly N. Amer.)add information to complete an official form or document
&I{Informal} To provide with information that is essential or newly acquired
jx.jx_cn_mean: 【非正式用语】 提供消息：提供必需的或最近获得的消息

lj.lj_ly: I wasn't there—would you fill me in?
lj.lj_ls: 我不在那里——你能告诉我那的消息吗

jx.jx_en_mean: To act as a substitute; stand in
jx.jx_cn_mean: 暂代：担任替补；临时替补

lj.lj_ly: an understudy who filled in at the last minute.
lj.lj_ls: 在最后一分钟才临时替补的演员

jx.jx_en_mean: To complete (a form, for example) by providing required information
jx.jx_cn_mean: 填写：通过提供所需的信息使（例如形式）而完成

lj.lj_ly: carefully filled out the job application.

jx.jx_en_mean: To become or make more fleshy
jx.jx_cn_mean: 长胖：变得或使变得更胖

jx.jx_en_mean: To assume someone's position or duties.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 取代某人的职位或责任

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English fyllan (verb), fyllu (noun) of Germanic origin; related to Dutch vullen and German füllen (verbs), Fülle (noun), also to full

entry.def: If you fill a container or area, or if it fills, an amount of something enters it that is enough to make it full.

example.ex: Fill a saucepan with water and bring to a slow boil...
example.tran: 往平底锅里加满水,小火煮沸。

example.ex: She made sandwiches, filled a flask and put sugar in...
example.tran: 她做了三明治，把保温瓶灌满，又放了糖进去。

entry.def: If something fills a space, it is so big, or there are such large quantities of it, that there is very little room left.

example.ex: He cast his eyes at the rows of cabinets that filled the enormous work area...
example.tran: 他把目光投向那一排排挤占了巨大工作空间的柜子。

example.ex: The text fills 231 pages.
example.tran: 正文占了 231 页。

entry.def: If you fill a crack or hole, you put a substance into it in order to make the surface smooth again.

example.ex: Fill small holes with wood filler in a matching colour...
example.tran: 用颜色相配的木质填料填平小孔。

example.ex: The gravedigger filled the grave.
example.tran: 掘墓人把墓穴填上。

entry.def: If a sound, smell, or light fills a space, or the air, it is very strong or noticeable.

example.ex: In the parking lot of the school, the siren filled the air...
example.tran: 警报声响彻学校停车场。

example.ex: All the light bars were turned on which filled the room with these rotating beams of light...
example.tran: 所有灯条都打开了，满屋都是旋转的光柱。

entry.tran: 使强烈地感到;(感情)充盈于
entry.def: If something fills you with an emotion, or if an emotion fills you, you experience this emotion strongly.

example.ex: I admired my father, and his work filled me with awe and curiosity...
example.tran: 我很钦佩父亲，并对他的工作充满了敬畏和好奇。

example.ex: He looked at me without speaking, and for the first time I could see the pride that filled him...
example.tran: 他看着我没有说话，我第一次看出他内心充满了自豪。

entry.def: If you fill a period of time with a particular activity, you spend the time in this way.

example.ex: If she wants a routine to fill her day, let her do community work.
example.tran: 如果她想做些日常的事务来打发白天的时间，就让她去做社区工作吧。

entry.def: If something fills a need or a gap, it puts an end to this need or gap by existing or being active.

example.ex: ...properly organized and staffed day-care programs fill a need which allows family structures to remain intact...
example.tran: 组织得当、人员配备齐整的日托中心满足了人们的需求，保持了家庭结构不受破坏。

example.ex: She brought him a sense of fun, of gaiety that filled a gap in his life.
example.tran: 她带给他开心快乐，弥补了他生命中的缺憾。

entry.def: If something fills a role, position, or function, they have that role or position, or perform that function, often successfully.

example.ex: Dena was filling the role of diplomat's wife with the skill she had learned over the years.
example.tran: 德娜利用她多年来学到的处事技巧扮演着外交家妻子的角色。

entry.def: If a company or organization fills a job vacancy, they choose someone to do the job. If someone fills a job vacancy, they accept a job that they have been offered.

example.ex: One problem not mentioned is the unemployed may not have the skills to fill the vacancies on offer...
example.tran: 一个没有提及的问题是，失业人员也许缺乏填补所提供的空职的技能。

example.ex: A vacancy has arisen which I intend to fill.
example.tran: 有一个职位空了出来，我想要补上。

entry.def: If you fill yourself with food, you eat so much that you do not feel hungry.

example.ex: They joked and drank coffee and filled themselves with chocolate cake.
example.tran: 他们开着玩笑，喝着咖啡，尽情地吃着巧克力蛋糕。

entry.tran: 使爆满;使满座;使座无虚席
entry.def: A play, film, or performer that fills a theatre, concert hall, or cinema attracts a very large audience.

example.ex: Children are enthralled by his stories; he has been known to fill theatre halls in Australia.
example.tran: 孩子们为他的故事所着迷;众所周知他在澳大利亚总是场场爆满。

entry.def: When a dentist fills someone's tooth, he or she puts a filling in it.

example.ex: It is almost impossible to find a dentist who will fill a tooth on the National Health.
example.tran: 几乎不可能找到一位愿意接受国民医疗保健来补牙的医师。

entry.def: If you fill an order or a prescription, you provide the things that are asked for.

example.ex: A pharmacist can fill any prescription if, in his or her judgment, the prescription is valid.
example.tran: 只要药剂师认定处方有效就可按方配药。

entry.def: If you have had your fill of something, you have had enough of it, and do not want to experience it any more or do it any more.

example.ex: We feel that we have had our fill of disappointments and emotional upsets.
example.tran: 我们觉得已经受够了失望和情绪困扰。

entry.def: If you fill in a form or other document requesting information, you write information in the spaces on it.

example.ex: If you want your free copy of the Patients' Charter fill this form in...
example.tran: 如果想要一份免费的《病人约章》，就把这张表填一下。

example.ex: Fill in the coupon and send it first class to the address shown.
example.tran: 填写订单，并按一类邮件寄至注明的地址。

entry.def: If you fill in a shape, you cover the area inside the lines with colour or shapes so that none of the background is showing.

example.ex: When you have both filled in your patterns, you may want to share these with each other...
example.tran: 两人都把图案填好色后，不妨互相交换着看一下。

example.ex: With a lip pencil, outline lips and fill them in.
example.tran: 用唇线笔勾出双唇的轮廓，然后涂上唇膏。

entry.def: If you fill someone in, you give them more details about something that you know about.

example.ex: I didn't give Reid all the details yet — I'll fill him in...
example.tran: 我还没有告诉里德所有详情——我会讲给他听的。

example.ex: He filled her in on Wilbur Kantor's visit.
example.tran: 他告诉她威尔伯·坎特此行的详细经过。

entry.def: If you fill in for someone, you do the work or task that they normally do because they are unable to do it.

example.ex: Vice-presidents' wives would fill in for first ladies.
example.tran: 副总统夫人们将临时代替各位第一夫人。

entry.def: If you are filling in time, you are using time that is available by doing something that is not very important.

example.ex: That's not a career. She's just filling in time until she gets married.
example.tran: 那算不上什么事业，她只不过是在嫁人之前打发一下时间而已。

entry.def: If you fill out a form or other document requesting information, you write information in the spaces on it.

example.ex: Fill out the application carefully, and keep copies of it.
example.tran: 仔细填写申请表，并且保存副本。

entry.def: If a fairly thin person fills out, they become fatter.

example.ex: A girl may fill out before she reaches her full height.
example.tran: 女孩子在长足个头之前可能会发胖。

entry.def: If you fill up or fill yourself up with food, you eat so much that you do not feel hungry.

example.ex: Fill up on potatoes, bread and pasta, which are high in carbohydrate and low in fat...
example.tran: 用碳水化合物含量高、脂肪含量低的土豆、面包和意大利面食填饱肚子。

example.ex: When you are happy about yourself you won't need to fill yourself up with food.
example.tran: 一个人如果感觉舒心，就不必去胡吃海塞。

entry.def: A type of food that fills you up makes you feel that you have eaten a lot, even though you have only eaten a small amount.

example.ex: Potatoes fill us up without overloading us with calories.
example.tran: 吃土豆容易让我们有一种饱胀感，又不会摄入过多的热量。

sentences.sentence: "she had heard her fill of gossip"

means.word_mean: 2. any material that fills a space or container;

sentences.sentence: "there was not enough fill for the trench"

means.word_mean: 1. make full, also in a metaphorical sense;
4. assume, as of positions or roles;

sentences.sentence: "She took the job as director of development"

means.word_mean: 5. fill or meet a want or need
6. appoint someone to (a position or a job)

auth_sentence.res_content: Take another bowl and fill it with tap water.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Take another bowl and fill it with tap water.

auth_sentence.res_content: Continue to fill each ring by about two thirds.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Continue to fill each ring by about two thirds.

auth_sentence.content: The room was starting to fill up with smoke.
auth_sentence.res_content: The room was starting to fill up with smoke.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The room was starting to fill up with smoke.

stems_affixes.word_buile: fill填满,充满,注满→ v.装满,盛满;占满;填充

Sentence.sentence: The fast-track trend fills a need, but it's also creating some tension between newcomers and veterans.
Most the spaces would be filled.
Let's pull in here, while I'm filling in the tank,you go ask the way and get me something to drink please.
and by early October he had yet to fill out the application.
Yes, he did a really fine job, filling in for Marsha like that at the last minute.
Filling out these forms consumes 7% of every tuition dollar.

sentences.en: Can you fill me a bucket of water, please?
I filled all my pockets full.
sentences.cn: 我把所有的口袋都装满了。

sentences.en: This should fill your requirements nicely.
sentences.cn: 这将大大地满足你的要求。

sentences.en: Please fill this glass for me.
sentences.cn: 请把这个杯子给我倒满。

sentences.en: Lucy is the best person to fill this secretary vacancy.
sentences.cn: 露西是秘书这个空缺的最佳人选。

sentences.en: Her main job was filling the doctor's prescriptions.
sentences.cn: 她的主要工作就是给大夫开的药方配药。

sentences.en: Would you like a fill of my tobacco?

jushi.english: The cistern is empty but soon fills again.
jushi.chinese: 蓄水池里现在没水,但不久就会储满水的。
人们把房间挤得满满的。
